description: A sonusDsx1AdminChangeNotification trap indicates the DS1 admin changes.
It is used to notify out-of-service, in-service, enabled and
disabled
tests: $SNMPTRAPCMD SONUS-DS1-MIB::sonusDsx1AdminChangeNotification SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusShelfIndex i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusSlotIndex i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusPortIndex i 9999 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusDs3Index i 9999 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusDs1Index i 9999 SONUS-DS1-MIB::sonusDs1AdmnState i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription s EXAMPLE SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel i 1

$SNMPTRAPCMD SONUS-DS1-MIB::sonusDsx1AdminChangeNotification SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusShelfIndex i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusSlotIndex i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusPortIndex i 9999 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusDs3Index i 9999 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusDs1Index i 9999 SONUS-DS1-MIB::sonusDs1AdmnState i 2 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription s EXAMPLE SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel i 4

description: A sonusDsx1OutOfServiceNotification trap indicates that a T1/E1 span
went out of service. The reason indicates the reason why and
type indicates the type of failure or alarm.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD SONUS-DS1-MIB::sonusDsx1OutOfServiceNotification SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusShelfIndex i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusSlotIndex i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusPortIndex i 9999 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusDs3Index i 9999 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusDs1Index i 9999 SONUS-DS1-MIB::sonusDs1OutOfServiceReason i 1 SONUS-DS1-MIB::sonusDs1OutOfServiceType i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription s EXAMPLE SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel i 1

description: A sonusDsx1ThresholdCrossingNotification trap indicates that a T1/E1 span
threshold has been crossed. The type indicates the type of threshold.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD SONUS-DS1-MIB::sonusDsx1ThresholdCrossingNotification SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusShelfIndex i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusSlotIndex i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusPortIndex i 9999 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusDs3Index i 9999 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusDs1Index i 9999 SONUS-DS1-MIB::sonusDs1ThresholdType i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription s EXAMPLE SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel i 1

description: A sonusDsx1LineStatusChangeNotification trap indicates the T1/E1 span state changes.
It is used to notify T1/E1 span Alarms states
tests: $SNMPTRAPCMD SONUS-DS1-MIB::sonusDsx1LineStatusChangeNotification SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusShelfIndex i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusSlotIndex i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusPortIndex i 9999 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusDs3Index i 9999 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusDs1Index i 9999 SONUS-DS1-MIB::sonusDs1LineState i 2 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription s EXAMPLE SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel i 1

$SNMPTRAPCMD SONUS-DS1-MIB::sonusDsx1LineStatusChangeNotification SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusShelfIndex i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusSlotIndex i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusPortIndex i 9999 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusDs3Index i 9999 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusDs1Index i 9999 SONUS-DS1-MIB::sonusDs1LineState i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription s EXAMPLE SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel i 4
